entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
